snippet: Dr. Craig Spencer’s condition has been upgraded to stable at Bellevue Hospital Center, where he remains in isolation, health officials said.
abstract: New York City health officials say doctors have upgraded condition of Dr Craig Spencer, city's first Ebola patient.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Craig Spencer’s condition has been upgraded to stable at Bellevue Hospital Center, where he remains in isolation, health officials said.

headline.main: New York Ebola Patient’s Condition Improves, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: New York Ebola Patient’s Condition Improves, Officials Say
